original_text: and the priest shall look. And if there is a white swelling in the skin that has turned the hair white, and there is raw flesh in the swelling,
korean_text: 제사장은 진찰할지니 피부에 흰 점이 돋고 털이 희어지고 거기 생살이 생겼으면

sentences.original_text: And if there is a white swelling in the skin
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 만약 피부에 흰 부어오름이 있고

sentences.original_text: that has turned the hair white,
and there is raw flesh in the swelling,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그 부어오름 속에 날것이 있으면
